meanings.sent1: This cookless meal is ready to eat straight from the fridge.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate having cookless options on busy weeknights.
meanings.sent3: The cookless salad was a refreshing change from the usual hot dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her kitchen felt strangely cookless without the aroma of a home-cooked meal.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of cookless foods makes life easier for many people.

meanings.definition: Lacking the presence of a cook.
meanings.sent1: The cookless kitchen seemed abandoned and quiet.
meanings.sent2: The cookless house felt eerie without anyone preparing meals.
meanings.sent3: The cookless restaurant had customers wondering who would prepare their food.
meanings.sent4: The cookless event left guests wondering who would take charge in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The cookless office party lacked the delicious dishes usually brought by the cook.
